sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM SYS_USER WHERE LOGIN_NAME=#loginName# AND LOGIN_PASSWORD=md5(#loginPassword#)
SELECT l.*,u.* From login_info as l,personal_info as u WHERE IDCARD_NO=#idcardNo# AND l.ID=u.USER_ID
SELECT l.*,u.* From login_info as l,personal_info as u WHERE l.ID = u.USER_ID
SELECT l.*,u.* From login_info as l,personal_info as u WHERE l.ID=#userId# AND l.ID=u.USER_ID
